synthesis_conditions.washing_method: Soaked in concentrated HCl, 1 M HCl, deionized water, and 0.1 M NaOH for two weeks
synthesis_conditions.additional_information: Microporous structure, BET surface area of 1877 m2 g-1, pore size centered at 11 and 14 Å, total pore volume of 0.73 cm3 g-1, maintains crystallinity and microporous structure after long time soak in water, acid, and base solvents, indicating ultrahigh stability.

synthesis_conditions.washing_method: Soaked in concentrated HCl, 1 M HCl, deionized water, and 0.1 M NaOH for two weeks
synthesis_conditions.additional_information: Becomes almost amorphous after being soaked in solvents, indicating lower stability compared to ZrMOF-1. BET surface area and pore volume significantly smaller than estimated from crystal structure due to possible pore structure collapse.
